name: AutoMiner
description: Mines a tunnel, until it finds ore. Then it'll mine that ore vein. Very not finished right now.

name: Cobbler
description: Quite a simple program. Digs cobble in front of it, dumps it in the chest below it. For use with a cobble generator.

name: EasyDig
description: Give it a width, depth and height and it'll dig the area out for you. Checks for fuel, and allows for both starting on the top or bottom of your area.

name: MineShafter
description: 15 down, 5 forward. Tell it how often to repeat this, it might ask you to feed it but afterwards your mine will be automatically dug out.

name: ECDYSIS
description: A collection of utility functions for turtles. Keeps track of position and direction, includes pathfinding.

name: TaBuLa
description: Simple extension library for tables. Printing, filtering etc.
